alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 1:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 130 PM PDT... At 1259 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Contact, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel to quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Contact. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Elko Nevada.
